hw3

Class Explosion

  • java.lang.Object
    • hw3.Sprite
      • hw3.Explosion

  • public class Explosion
extends Sprite
    This class contains the information needed to render an explosion on screen. It extends the abstract class Sprite. It is fairly similar with to Sprite with the addition of a life time that the explosion will last on screen.
    Author:
    Michael Lux

    • Constructor Detail

      • Explosion

        public Explosion(double x,
                 double y,
                 int width,
                 int height,
                 Renderer givenRenderer,
                 int initialCount)
        Constructs a new Explosion
        Parameters:
        x - top left horizontal location
        y - top left vertical location
        width - the width of the explosion
        height - the height of the explosion
        givenRenderer - the screen in which the explosion will appear
        initialCount - the life time of the given explosion
